Question: Should patients with RA initiating MTX receive MTX at 15mg or more per week (includes up-titrating to 15mg over the first month) or less than 15mg per week as the initial dose?

Explanations.a: Downgraded by one level due to serious imprecision. Small sample size.
Explanations.c: Downgraded by two levels due to very serious imprecision. Confidence interval including both values suggesting benefit and values suggesting no effect. Very small sample size.
Explanations.d: Downgraded by two levels due to very serious imprecision. Confidence interval including both values suggesting benefit and values suggesting harm. Very small sample size and low number of events.

References.1: Dhir V, Singla M, Gupta N, Goyal P, Sagar V, Sharma A, et al. Randomized controlled trial comparing 2 different starting doses of methotrexate in rheumatoid arthritis. Clinical Therapeutics. 2014;36(7):1005.
